mapper.select: select a.surveyid as surveyid, a.answerid as answerid, a.remark as remark, a.userid as userid, a.companyid as companyid,a.questionid from sys_survey_result as a where a.surveyid = #{surveyid}
select id,cntitle,showtype,code,parentid from sys_survey_question where parentid=#{surveyid} and useable=1 order by orders asc
